mapper.select: /* Generated SQL SQL ID : ti_nutr_stat_stnd.select */ SELECT nutr_cd /* nutr_cd 영양소_코드 character varying(20) */ , nutr_stat_cd /* nutr_stat_cd 영양섭취_상태_코드 character varying(4000) */ , nutr_rmrk /* nutr_rmrk 영양섭취_비고 character varying(4000) */ , reg_dt /* reg_dt 등록_일자 character(8) */ , reg_tm /* reg_tm 등록_시각 character(6) */ , reg_user_id /* reg_user_id 등록_사용자_ID character varying(20) */ , upt_dt /* upt_dt 수정_일자 character(8) */ , upt_tm /* upt_tm 수정_시각 character(6) */ , upt_user_id /* upt_user_id 수정_사용자_ID character varying(20) */ FROM ti_nutr_stat_stnd WHERE nutr_cd = #{nutrCd} /* nutr_cd 영양소_코드 character varying(20) */ AND nutr_stat_cd = #{nutrStatCd} /* nutr_stat_cd 영양섭취_상태_코드 character varying(4000) */
mapper.insert:
/* Generated SQL SQL ID : ti_nutr_stat_stnd.insert */ INSERT INTO ti_nutr_stat_stnd ( nutr_cd /* nutr_cd 영양소_코드 character varying(20) */ , nutr_stat_cd /* nutr_stat_cd 영양섭취_상태_코드 character varying(4000) */
, nutr_rmrk /* nutr_rmrk 영양섭취_비고 character varying(4000) */
, reg_dt /* reg_dt 등록_일자 character(8) */ , reg_tm /* reg_tm 등록_시각 character(6) */
, reg_user_id /* reg_user_id 등록_사용자_ID character varying(20) */
, upt_dt /* upt_dt 수정_일자 character(8) */ , upt_tm /* upt_tm 수정_시각 character(6) */
, upt_user_id /* upt_user_id 수정_사용자_ID character varying(20) */
) VALUES ( #{nutrCd} /* nutr_cd 영양소_코드 character varying(20) */ #{nutrStatCd} /* nutr_stat_cd 영양섭취_상태_코드 character varying(4000) */
, #{nutrRmrk} /* nutr_rmrk 영양섭취_비고 character varying(4000) */
, to_char(now(), 'YYYYMMDD') /* reg_dt 등록_일자 character(8) */ , to_char(now(), 'HH24MISS') /* reg_tm 등록_시각 character(6) */
, #{regUserId} /* reg_user_id 등록_사용자_ID character varying(20) */
, to_char(now(), 'YYYYMMDD') /* upt_dt 수정_일자 character(8) */ , to_char(now(), 'HH24MISS') /* upt_tm 수정_시각 character(6) */
, #{uptUserId} /* upt_user_id 수정_사용자_ID character varying(20) */
)
mapper.update:
/* Generated SQL SQL ID : ti_nutr_stat_stnd.update */ UPDATE ti_nutr_stat_stnd
, nutr_rmrk = #{nutrRmrk} /* nutr_rmrk 영양섭취_비고 character varying(4000) */
, upt_dt = to_char(now(), 'YYYYMMDD') /* upt_dt 수정_일자 character(8) */ , upt_tm = to_char(now(), 'HH24MISS') /* upt_tm 수정_시각 character(6) */
, upt_user_id = #{uptUserId} /* upt_user_id 수정_사용자_ID character varying(20) */
WHERE nutr_cd = #{nutrCd} /* nutr_cd 영양소_코드 character varying(20) */ AND nutr_stat_cd = #{nutrStatCd} /* nutr_stat_cd 영양섭취_상태_코드 character varying(4000) */
